description:
It's hard talking to people you disagree with.⁣
⁣
It's hard listening to someone's logic when you know they're wrong.⁣
⁣
However, the alternative—a society where freedom of speech is restricted, is unimaginable. ⁣
⁣
Conversations can change minds,⁣
⁣
whereas restricting conversations is like treating a medical condition only for its symptoms.⁣
⁣
While it may feel like a short-term solution, if you don't address the root cause, the problem shall persist. ⁣
⁣
Censorship never addresses the root cause, and therefore is never the solution.⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
